summary: REQ-24 and most of REQ-25 appear implemented via a text-centric single-page layout (hero, love letter, reasons, CTA) and a simple 2-step Valentine CTA component. However, the diff summary indicates photo assets are still present and described as being displayed, which conflicts with the text-only/no-photos requirement (REQ-23). The diff summary also indicates additional interactive components (e.g., a 4-step flow) that were not requested and may conflict with the “simple interaction” constraint.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all photo usage and make the experience completely text-only; do not reference/display any uploaded images including IMG_5979.jpeg; remove all references such as /assets/photos/IMG_3752.jpeg and /assets/photos/IMG_3753.jpeg.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary explicitly lists photo files under frontend/public/assets/photos and states they are displayed in sections of the proposal page, which contradicts the requirement to remove all photo usage and references.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for "frontend/public/assets/photos/IMG_3752.jpeg" and "frontend/public/assets/photos/IMG_3753.jpeg" describe them as displayed)

missing_requirements.requirement: Optional celebration effect must respect prefers-reduced-motion (i.e., no celebration animation when reduced motion is enabled).
missing_requirements.reason: A confetti effect is triggered (ConfettiBurst), but the diff summary does not include ConfettiBurst’s implementation, so reduced-motion compliance for that celebration effect cannot be verified from provided evidence.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions frontend/src/components/ConfettiBurst.tsx but its code is not shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Including/displaying couple photo assets IMG_3752.jpeg and IMG_3753.jpeg in the proposal page.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly requires the site to be text-only with no photos and no references to those assets.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/public/assets/photos/IMG_3752.jpeg": "displayed in the hero section"; "frontend/public/assets/photos/IMG_3753.jpeg": "displayed in the message section")

hallucinated_features.description: A multi-step proposal CTA flow with 4 steps (ProposalStepFlow).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-25 requires the interaction to be single-step or at most two steps; a 4-step flow exceeds the requested complexity and is not asked for in the BuildRequest.
Not requested in REQ-23/24/25; the requested structure is hero + letter + reasons + closing CTA with simple interaction.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/components/SurpriseReveal.tsx": "Interactive surprise section with envelope illustration...")
